thread.title: WVU Rifle Enters 2015 as Top-Ranked Team
thread.title_full: WVU Rifle Enters 2015 as Top-Ranked Team

title: WVU Rifle Enters 2015 as Top-Ranked Team
text: Last updated on October 05, 2015 @ 6:33PM Created on October 05, 2015 @ 6:32PM Complete Jon Hammond Interview The WVU Rifle team enters the 2015-2016 season ranked No. 1 in the nation. Jon Hammond and company will pursue their fourth straight and 18th overall National Championship this upcoming year. Six All-Americans return including 8-time All-American Garrett Spurgeon. WVU's season starts this Saturday at Air Force. Share
